item.description:
Pass this along - there will be a blood shortage shortly with the marathon bombings.

 

Please come tomorrow.  Bring freinds.

 

I give blood regularly with my two donor-buddies - David who is 67 and George who is 79, and gave today (Feb 11th). That makes me eligible on April 8th. Normally I would schedule something for that week but George heads to Florida for 8 weeks and will not return until mid April. David's birthday is April 25th so we will put off the donation for a couple of weeks and donate in Dedham at the Red Cross center on Thursday April 25th - David's 68th birthday. No better treat on one's birthday than to GIVE the gift of life with a great group of people. Soooo, come join us. If we get at least 15 people to join I will spring for a birthday cake and candles.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Buddy can you spare a pint... of blood?
